pr_title: Split ir nodes for variable/field access into load/store

timeline.message: Move bootstrap injection into the the ir tree builder phase

move ScriptClassInfo out of walker and remove unncessary injection
phases
add AccessNode in place of ECall, EBrace, and EDot

add slightly different node setup and decorations for compound
assignment
split ir nodes into load and store
